game.name: The Way of Knight
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: The Way of Knight is a chess-like puzzle game where you think your way through various enemies, boards, and hazards.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The Way of Knight is a chess-like puzzle game where you think your way through various enemies, boards, and hazards.
